summary: This memorandum discusses a meeting held to discuss the ramifications of a confrontation with the New York FBI office regarding Herbert Itkin. It also discusses Thomas L. Roberts' affiliation with the FBI, CIA, and Itkin, as well as Robert Delson's potential use in Projects DTPILLAR and WUBRINY.
title: MEMORANDUM FOR THE RECORD SUBJECT: Herbert Itkin
sender: JOHN K. GREANEY, Assistant General Counsel
